name: BS-9001 Quality Testing
description:
Congratulations on getting a job at the

         

You are working in quality control to test out the brand new advancements in un-hackable drones, namely the wondrous and delightful

As per our security consultant requirements, the drone has no wireless capabilities. This makes it truly un-hackable and Out of Control (TM) from our enemies (and, well, you. No changing you mind mid-mission !).

You therefore have to program the drone from one of our charge stations before sending it on its mission. Once launched, no one can stop it until it completes its task.

Should the drone run out of commands, it will self-destruct to prevent retrieval of our proprietary technology by enemy forces. A paragon of security !

Do enjoy your first day in the test field. And remember : Science, it works !

Controls : The goal of the game is to record the actions of the BS-9001 at a control station, then play the recording and hope everything goes smoothly.
